name: places/ChIJq6raIgFZwokRtDCjoGFDb9E
adrFormatAddress: 85 8th Ave #6M, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
I called different employment lawyers in the area to review a non compete agreement. Lauren answered and took my information and explained their process for reviewing contracts. She was polite, sincere and very helpful. I was able to schedule an appointment with Carrie the same week.

My experience with Carrie was very positive. I had previously sent Lauren the contract along with a few questions. Carrie was on time for our call and went through each of my questions, thoroughly. She highlighted items a lawyer in my home state had missed. Her answers were precise and clear. I had a follow up question I sent through email to Lauren and they responded within an hour with the answer.

If you are looking through reviews to find a good attorney, I would recommend this firm. It was a great experience all around.

originalText.text:
Hey Greg,
I just wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for your exceptional work as an employment attorney. Hands-down, you are one of the best I've ever worked with. Your expertise and dedication to your clients are truly impressive.

I have also had the pleasure of interacting with your team, and I must say, they are phenomenal. The level of professionalism and efficiency they demonstrate is truly remarkable.

Thank you once again for your outstanding service. I will not hesitate to recommend you and your team to anyone in need of legal assistance in employment matters.

Latrice

originalText.text: I screened multiple lawyers and when I found Greg, I knew he had to be the one for me.  He is so so intelligent and intuitive.  I was so excited for him to work on my case.  He asked all the right questions and could really understand the problem, or has a hunch for picking up on what’s going on real quick.  He is truly genuine and different from other lawyers.  Greg really was meant to be a lawyer because he’s got the intuition most people wish they had.  My case worked out wonderfully thanks to his expertise, and it only took a couple of weeks.  He’s one in a million.

originalText.text: I can't recommend Greg and Mansell Law highly enough. I needed representation unexpectedly and on a tight timeline to negotiate with an employer represented by a top 20 global law firm. Greg moved quickly and skillfully, getting results that exceeded both my expectations and typical outcomes for the type of situation I was in. He was always direct and honest, and he kept me updated on the latest developments even if they came in after hours. He operated with a lot of integrity and had my best interests in mind even in the fine details. Greg clearly cares, has a passion for protecting employee rights, and truly wants to help his clients. If I have any future employment law needs, I will definitely be returning to Mansell Law and would enthusiastically recommend them to friends and family.

originalText.text:
I am incredibly grateful that I found Mansell Law. Carrie is an amazing lawyer. She was very helpful with my employment law issue. Carrie is great at communication, she constantly kept me updated via email and phone call. She is also patient, professional and intelligent. She was able to help me get good results and I’m very appreciative. I will always recommend this firm to anyone who needs assistance.

Thank you!
